text: Gary Owen Schmalzbauer (born January 27, 1940) is an American former ice hockey forward and Olympian. Schmalzbauer played with Team USA at the 1964 Winter Olympics held in Innsbruck, Austria. He also played for the Rochester Mustangs in the United States Hockey League. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Saint Paul, Minnesota Category:Ice hockey players at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of the United States Category:American men's ice hockey left wingers Category:Minnesota Golden Gophers men's ice hockey players Category:Ice hockey people from Minnesota
title: Gary Schmalzbauer
